name: DeskTective
description:
Use WASD to move the mouse around, you can click on the lightbulb to change the lighting, but be careful, you don't want the lighting to give you away. 

I created contrast by having the player control movements by using transform.Translate, and having the emails bounce around using physics. I wanted to contrast the controlled motion of the mouse cursor with the more erratic urgent motion of emails popping up on your screen. There are a few things I would like to change but overall I’m happy with how this turned out.
